metadata.Title: CVE-2021-36713 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the DataTables plug-in 1.9.2 for jQuery allows attackers to run arbitrary code via the sBaseName parameter to function _fnCreateCookie. NOTE: 1.9.2 is a version from 2012.

criterions.comment: datatables.js: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
